[Jekyll](https://jekyllrb.com/) is a static site generator that powers [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/). Jekyll is written in Ruby.

### Examples

The following science blogs use Jekyll as a platform:

* [Martin Paul Eve](https://eve.gd/)
* [Journal of Open Source Software Blog](https://blog.joss.theoj.org/)
* [Bastian Greshake Tzovaras](https://tzovar.as/)
